description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.0M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with UNIVERSITY OF WATERLOO. The average
  contract duration was 0.86 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $243.0K. The longest
  contract was 7.76 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $6.3M.
